Package model

Class SudokuSolver

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.SudokuSolver
  • public class SudokuSolver
extends java.lang.Object
    Sudoku is a puzzle consisting of 9*9 boxes. Some boxes are initially filled in with numbers between 1 and 9. This class finds a solution that meets the Sudoku rules.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      SudokuSolver()
      Initialize a new 9*9 empty matrix
      SudokuSolver​(int[][] matrix)
      Setup a new 9*9 matrix with numbers that user selected.

      Check if the region contains the nr.
      boolean nrExistInRowColumn​(int x, int y, int nr)
      Check if the row or the column contains the nr.

      Change an existing number at position x,y to 0.
      boolean setNumber​(int x, int y, int nr)
      Initialize boxes with numbers between 1 to 9.
      boolean solve()
      Wrapper method which call another method to solve the Sudoku according to the rules.
      java.lang.String toString()
      Convert the Sudoku matrix to a String.

      • solve

        public boolean solve()
        Wrapper method which call another method to solve the Sudoku according to the rules.
        Returns:
        True if it can solve the Sudoku otherwise it return False.

        Check if the region contains the nr.
        Parameters:

        y - column
        nr - number
        Returns:
